alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 10:17AM CST until February 25 at 8:24AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County. Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Low land near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 26.2 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 16.4 feet by Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Noxubee River Macon 26.0 26.2 Thu 9 am CST 24.2 22.4 20.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 7PM CST.
